title.narrative: FELD Action Tracker: Seed funding for scoping and development

description.narrative: (i) a methodology and protocol for collecting and assessing national policies and associated targets, including initial consultations on methodology with experts, practitioners and partners; (ii) the development of an initial database for the collection of national policies, targets and investment frameworks relating to food and land-use systems in an initial set of countries, to be followed by local consultation and validation with governments and other national stakeholders; (iii) an interim report of preliminary findings in 2020 related to national policies and targets, as well as a mapping of existing resources, databases, monitoring and mechanisms relevant for the scope and objectives of the Action Tracker, including gaps and emerging examples of good practices.
Subgrant (via WRI) for the scoping and development of the FELD Action Tracker, as per agreement with DFID with an initial focus on early/mid 2020

activity-date.narrative: Planned end will be end of December 2021
Planned start of the seed funding was 1 November 2019. Effective start was ...

recipient-country.narrative: As one of 10 starting countries the FELD Action Tracker will focus on. During the scoping phase covered under this grant though, the work remains at global level.
